system.description:
When you wish to conjure a hex upon them, state the full name of someone you can see and the reason for your curse. Hexes are narrative - tell us what they lose and what they gain, such as losing arms to gain wings, losing claws to gain suction cups, or losing speech to gain gills.

Your hexes always end at dawn's first light. Hexes never work on a Threat to the World. If you try to hex another player, they may attempt to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.aFNAJFmoqfsOHOB8]{Overcome} your hex after you tell them what it is. Your hexes can never be directly lethal, such as taking away the ability to breathe.

Otherwise, your hexes always work every time.
